titleStmt.title: Advice concerning bills of exchange. By John Marius, publick notary.
titleStmt.author: Marius, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.G. and are to be sold by Nich. Bourne, at the south-entrance into the Royall Exchange,
